brand.name: Teasers CLE
brand.tagline: Where anticipation is the main course.
brand.mission: Teasers CLE is a Cleveland nightlife promotions company launching immersive pop-up events that preview the future Teasers lounge. Each event teases what's coming—passed menu tastings, roaming cocktail service, and pure dance floor energy.
brand.tone: Electric, mysterious, inclusive, and culturally diverse.
brand.positioning: Teasers CLE blends Caribbean soul with African American culture, Cleveland pride, and global nightlife—every event is a party first, a menu preview second.

story.origin: Born from a vision to bring Trinidad carnival energy to Cleveland's nightlife scene, Teasers CLE started as a concept for an immersive lounge. We're building toward that brick-and-mortar dream by throwing unforgettable pop-up parties—each one testing menu items, cocktails, and vibes that will define the future space.
story.vision: To open Cleveland's most talked-about lounge where Caribbean flavors meet global nightlife culture, and every night feels like an event you had to be there for.

events.name: Carnival After Dark
events.description: Experience Trinidad carnival's electric energy reimagined for a Cleveland night. This isn't a concert—it's a full-body immersion into the most celebrated street party on earth. Soca rhythms pulse through a crowd dressed in sequins, feathers, and carnival-ready fits while cocktail servers weave through with champagne and Caribbean rum punches. Your ticket includes passed menu tastings showcasing what Teasers CLE will serve when the lounge opens.
events.tagline: Friday the 13th never felt this lucky.
events.fullDescription: Costume encouraged. Body paint station. Glow accessories. Soca DJ all night. This is your Valentine's weekend done different.
passed: Jerk chicken lollipops with mango glaze
Plantain chips with pepper sauce caviar
Coconut rum shrimp on sugarcane skewers
bar: The Mas — Spiced rum, passionfruit, lime, carnival energy
Port of Spain Sunset — Coconut rum, mango, grenadine glow
events.vibe: Costume encouraged, body paint station, glow accessories, soca DJ all night.

events.name: Soul Sessions
events.description: Grown and sexy doesn't mean boring. Soul Sessions is where Cleveland's Black professionals come to unwind to the sounds that raised them—classic soul, neo-soul, and R&B slow burns that transition into uptempo bangers as the night heats up. Dress sharp, sip champagne, taste elevated Southern comfort food, and let the DJ take you from Anita Baker to Summer Walker.
events.fullDescription: Dress code enforced. No sneakers. Sophisticated, intimate, sensual. This is date night energy or girls' night elevation.
passed: Fried chicken sliders with hot honey drizzle
Mac & cheese cups with truffle breadcrumbs
Collard green spring rolls with sweet chili dip
bar: Cleveland Soul — Cognac, honey, lemon, bitters
Neo Classic — Bourbon, peach purée, vanilla smoke
events.vibe: Dress code enforced. No sneakers. Date night or girls' night elevation.

events.name: Rum & Riddim
events.description: Start with knowledge, end with motion. Rum & Riddim opens with a 30-minute premium rum tasting led by a spirits expert, then transitions into a full-blown reggae and soca party. Learn the difference between aged Barbadian rum and Jamaican overproof, then put that education to work on the dance floor. Every ticket includes passed Caribbean bites paired with the tasting.
events.tagline: Taste the islands, then move to them.
events.fullDescription: Come for the culture, stay for the vibes. DJ spins classic reggae and modern soca until close.
bar: The Riddim — Soca-inspired rum punch, three rums, tropical chaos
Kingston Sour — Dark rum, lime, egg white, Angostura foam
events.vibe: Rum education (9-9:30pm), then reggae and soca until close.

events.name: 90s Hip-Hop Night
events.description: If you remember when MTV played music videos and rap had a message, this night is for you. A Cleveland DJ spins nothing but golden era classics—Biggie, Pac, Wu-Tang, Tribe, Lauryn, Missy, Jay, Nas—while you feast on the party food that fueled house parties in '96. Throwback fits encouraged. Champagne and Hennessy flow all night.
events.tagline: The golden era never sounded this good.
events.fullDescription: Baggy jeans. Jerseys. Timbs. Kangols. Pure nostalgia, zero pretense. This is the party that takes you back.
passed: Classic buffalo wings (Frank's RedHot, real butter)
bar: Golden Era — Hennessy, ginger ale, nostalgia
Wu-Tang — Spiced rum, honey, lemon, 36 chambers
events.vibe: Throwback fits encouraged. Pure 90s vibes, zero pretense.

events.name: The Fete
events.description: In Trinidad, 'the fete' means the all-inclusive party where the drinks never stop and the vibes never dip. We're bringing that energy to Cleveland. Your ticket gets you unlimited access to roaming rum punch, champagne, beer, and passed Trini street food all night long. No cash bar. No limits. Just pure soca, pure vibes, pure fete.
events.fullDescription: All-inclusive means ALL. No wallet out all night. Dance, drink, eat, repeat.
bar: The Fete — Overproof rum, lime, Angostura bitters, chaos
Trini Mule — Aged rum, ginger beer, lime, island kick
events.vibe: All-inclusive wristbands. No cash bar. Dance, drink, eat, repeat.

events.name: Latin Nights
events.description: Reggaeton basslines. Salsa rhythms. Bachata sensuality. Latin Nights is Cleveland's hottest dance floor, fueled by tequila shots, champagne, and the kind of passed Latin street food that keeps you moving. Whether you're here to dance or just watch people who can, the energy is infectious and the mojitos are cold.
events.tagline: Move to the rhythm or move aside.
events.fullDescription: High energy. Dance-focused. Reggaeton heavy, salsa when you need a break. Dress to move.
bar: Fuego — Tequila, jalapeño, lime, agave, heat
Noche Latina — White rum, passion fruit, lime, mint
events.vibe: High energy. Dance-focused. Reggaeton heavy, salsa breaks.

events.name: CLE Nights
events.description: This one's for the homegrown. CLE Nights celebrates everything Cleveland—Great Lakes beer, pierogies, Polish boys, Stadium Mustard, and a DJ spinning the mix of hip-hop, dance, and top 40 that makes our city move. Sports jerseys welcome. Civic pride required. Local vendors featured. This is Believeland after dark.
events.tagline: Cleveland pride. Cleveland vibes. Cleveland loud.
events.fullDescription: Wear your Cavs jersey. Your Browns gear. Your Guardians hat. This is home.
passed: Polish boy sliders (kielbasa, fries, slaw, BBQ sauce)
Local brewery beer cheese dip with pretzels
bar: The 216 — Local bourbon, maple syrup, orange bitters
Believeland — Vodka, orange juice, pride, resilience
events.vibe: Sports jerseys welcome. Civic pride required. This is home.

events.name: Kingston Meets Port of Spain
events.description: Jamaica versus Trinidad. Reggae versus soca. Jerk versus curry. Two islands, one dance floor, infinite vibes. The DJ alternates between Kingston dancehall classics and Port of Spain soca anthems while you taste the best of both cultures. Flag waving encouraged. Island pride required. May the best playlist win.
events.fullDescription: Friendly rivalry. Dance battles. Flag waving. Two islands, one love.
passed: Ackee & saltfish bites on fried bake
Curry goat sliders with mango slaw
bar: Two Islands — Jamaican & Trini rum blend, the peace treaty
Crossover — Jerk-spiced margarita (yes, really)
events.vibe: Friendly rivalry. Dance battles. Flag waving. Island pride.

events.name: Black Velvet
events.description: Luxury. Excellence. Elegance. Black Velvet is the all-black dress code event where Cleveland's Black elite come to see and be seen. Champagne towers. Top-shelf cognac service. Upscale soul food passed by servers in black-on-black. The soundtrack is a curated mix of R&B, afrobeats, and tasteful trap. This is the night you dress up for.
events.tagline: Black excellence. Black opulence. Black joy.
events.fullDescription: All-black everything. Dress code strictly enforced. VIP sections available. Opulence required.
passed: Shrimp & grits bites (white cheddar, Tasso ham)
Braised short rib on sweet potato medallions
roaming: Premium cognac neat pours (Hennessy XO, Rémy Martin)
bar: Black Gold — Cognac, honey, lemon, edible gold flakes
Velvet Night — Bourbon, dark chocolate, Scotch bonnet tincture
events.vibe: All-black dress code. VIP sections. Opulence required.

events.name: Neon Noir
events.description: The future of nightlife is here, glowing emerald and rose gold under UV lights. Neon Noir is Teasers CLE's most experimental night—molecular gastronomy bites, glow-in-the-dark cocktails, dry ice presentations, and a house/electronic soundtrack that feels like a cyberpunk fever dream. Dress futuristic. Think fashion-forward. Leave reality at the door.
events.fullDescription: UV lights. Fashion show energy. House and electronic music. This is the Instagram event.
passed: Glow tonic cocktails in LED cups
bar: Electric Emerald — Gin, glow tonic, lime, neon energy
Rose Gold Rush — White rum, rose water, gold shimmer, future
events.vibe: UV lights. Fashion-forward. House/electronic music. Instagram energy.

events.name: Warehouse Sessions
events.description: Cleveland's industrial underbelly comes alive. Warehouse Sessions strips nightlife down to its raw essentials—concrete floors, exposed brick, a massive sound system, and nothing but vibes. House music. Techno. Underground electronic. Craft beer buckets contrast with champagne trays. Street food style bites. No frills, all energy.
events.fullDescription: Industrial. Underground. Raw. Cleveland's warehouse culture meets nightlife.
passed: Giant soft pretzels with beer cheese
bar: The Warehouse — Whiskey, ginger beer, lime, raw energy
Rust Belt — Bourbon, Angostura, orange, Cleveland grit
events.vibe: Industrial. Underground. Raw. Cleveland warehouse culture.

events.name: Velvet Sundays
events.description: The weekend's last stand. Velvet Sundays is the end-of-weekend party where the dress code is 'whatever' and the vibe is 'just dance.' The DJ plays everything—R&B, hip-hop, top 40, house—and the food is pure comfort. Champagne, beer, mimosas at night (yes, really), and a crowd that just wants to extend the weekend one more night.
events.fullDescription: Come as you are. Dance to whatever. No theme, just vibes. The weekend's not over yet.
bar: Sunday Funday — Vodka, pineapple, orange, coconut, denial
Wind Down — Whiskey, ginger, honey, Monday dread
events.vibe: No dress code. Mixed music. Pure vibes. Weekend extension.

events.name: Independence Fete
events.description: On August 31st, Cleveland becomes Port of Spain. Independence Fete celebrates Trinidad & Tobago's freedom with a night of national pride, traditional food, and pure soca energy. Red, white, and black dress code. Flag waving. National anthem moment at midnight. Then the DJ plays nothing but Trini soca until the sun threatens to rise.
events.tagline: Raise the flag. Raise the energy.
events.fullDescription: National pride. Anthem at midnight. Flags everywhere. Pure Trini energy. This is the cultural cornerstone.
bar: Independence — Aged Angostura rum, bitters, lime, freedom
Red White Black — Layered shot representing the flag
events.vibe: Red/white/black dress code. Anthem at midnight. Flag waving. National pride.

menu.title: Doubles Shooters
menu.description: Trinidad's beloved street food reimagined: curried chickpea goodness nestled in pillowy bara bread, topped with tangy tamarind chutney. One bite transports you to a Port of Spain sunrise.

menu.title: Jerk Chicken Lollipops
menu.description: Jamaican heat meets sticky-sweet seduction. These drumettes are marinated in authentic jerk spices, grilled to perfection, then glazed with mango and fire—lick your fingers, we dare you.

menu.title: Plantain Chips with Pepper Sauce Caviar
menu.description: Golden plantain crisps crowned with bursts of Caribbean pepper sauce encapsulated in tiny spheres. Addictive crunch meets controlled heat—molecular gastronomy that respects the islands.

menu.title: Coconut Rum Shrimp on Sugarcane Skewers
menu.description: Plump shrimp bathed in coconut rum and skewered on edible sugarcane sticks. Each bite delivers tropical sweetness, ocean brine, and just enough island spirit to keep the night interesting.

menu.title: Fried Chicken Sliders with Hot Honey Drizzle
menu.description: Southern soul food elevated: buttermilk-fried chicken breast on a brioche bun, drizzled with honey infused with cayenne kick. This is the taste that makes grown folks weak in the knees.

menu.title: Mac & Cheese Cups with Truffle Breadcrumbs
menu.description: Creamy, three-cheese decadence crowned with crispy truffle panko. This is comfort food in couture—soul food that knows it's fancy and owns every bite.

menu.title: Collard Green Spring Rolls with Sweet Chili Dip
menu.description: Southern greens meet Asian technique in this cross-cultural masterpiece. Tender collards wrapped tight and fried crispy, served with a sweet chili sauce that bridges continents with every dip.

menu.title: Bourbon-Glazed Short Rib Tips
menu.description: Fall-off-the-bone beef tips slow-braised and lacquered with bourbon reduction. This is the kind of meat that makes you close your eyes and nod in appreciation—pure grown-and-sexy energy.

menu.title: Rum-Glazed Pork Belly Bites
menu.description: Caribbean rum caramelizes into a sticky-sweet coating on crispy-edged, melt-in-your-mouth pork belly. Each cube is a lesson in balance: fat, sweet, spice, and island soul.

menu.title: Jerk Wings with Lime Crema
menu.description: Chicken wings bathed in authentic Jamaican jerk marinade, charred to smoky perfection, then cooled with zesty lime crema. The heat builds slow—the cooling relief is instant.

menu.title: Breadfruit Fries with Garlic Aioli
menu.description: The Caribbean's starchy treasure, sliced thick and fried golden like the best fries you've never had. Dipped in roasted garlic aioli, this is island comfort food that needs no introduction.

menu.title: Tamarind BBQ Rib Tips
menu.description: Smoky pork ribs glazed in tangy-sweet tamarind BBQ sauce—a fusion of American backyard tradition and Caribbean fruit magic. Sticky fingers guaranteed, napkins optional.

menu.title: Classic Buffalo Wings
menu.description: No tricks, no fusion—just Frank's RedHot, real butter, and perfectly fried chicken wings. This is the taste of '90s house parties and basement cookouts, executed with reverence.

menu.title: Loaded Cheese Fries with Bacon
menu.description: Crispy fries buried under a mountain of melted cheese, crispy bacon, sour cream, and chives. This is late-night indulgence and day-party fuel rolled into one glorious pile.

menu.title: Mini Cheeseburger Sliders
menu.description: American classic shrunk down but not dumbed down: juicy beef patties, melted cheese, special sauce, pickles, on toasted buns. These sliders hit every nostalgic note.

menu.title: Pizza Rolls & Mozzarella Sticks
menu.description: Pure '90s nostalgia: crispy pizza rolls and golden mozzarella sticks with marinara dip. This is the snack table at every party that mattered, now served with champagne.

menu.title: Mini Pelau Bowls
menu.description: Trinidad's ultimate one-pot comfort: rice stewed with pigeon peas, caramelized chicken, and coconut milk in mini portions. Every spoonful tastes like Sunday dinner at grandma's house in Port of Spain.

menu.title: Bake & Shark Sliders
menu.description: Trinidad's iconic beach snack reimagined: crispy fried shark on fluffy coconut bake, topped with tangy slaw and pepper sauce. This is Maracas Bay energy, landlocked in Cleveland.

menu.title: Pholourie with Tamarind Sauce
menu.description: Golden fried split pea fritters—crispy outside, fluffy inside—served with sweet-and-sour tamarind dipping sauce. This Trini street food staple is dangerously addictive.

menu.title: Curried Chickpea Cups
menu.description: Warm, spiced chickpeas simmered in aromatic curry and served in crispy phyllo cups. Vegetarian comfort food with bold Caribbean flavor that converts carnivores on contact.

menu.title: Beef Empanadas with Chimichurri
menu.description: Flaky, golden pastry pockets stuffed with seasoned ground beef, then paired with bright, herbaceous chimichurri. This is Latin street food perfection—handheld, hot, and impossible to resist.

menu.title: Street-Style Taquitos
menu.description: Crispy rolled tortillas filled with your choice of slow-braised chicken or carne asada, served with lime crema and salsa verde. This is taco truck energy elevated to nightclub status.

menu.title: Ceviche in Mini Cups
menu.description: Fresh white fish cured in citrus, tossed with red onion, cilantro, and a kiss of jalapeño heat. Served ice-cold in shot-sized portions—refreshing, bright, and dangerously easy to keep eating.

menu.title: Sweet Plantain Chips with Guacamole
menu.description: Ripe plantains sliced thin and fried to caramelized perfection, served alongside creamy, lime-spiked guacamole. Sweet meets savory in this Latin-Caribbean fusion snack.

menu.title: Chorizo-Stuffed Dates
menu.description: Medjool dates stuffed with spicy chorizo and wrapped in crispy bacon—sweet, savory, smoky, and utterly addictive. This is tapas-style seduction on a toothpick.

menu.title: Pierogi Bites
menu.description: Cleveland's Polish heritage, fried crispy: potato and cheese pierogis golden-brown and served with sour cream. This is home, comfort, and civic pride in dumpling form.

menu.title: Polish Boy Sliders
menu.description: Cleveland's legendary street food shrunk to slider size: kielbasa topped with fries, coleslaw, and BBQ sauce on a bun. Messy, iconic, and unapologetically CLE.

menu.title: Stadium Mustard Hot Wings
menu.description: Chicken wings tossed in Cleveland's iconic Stadium Mustard glaze—tangy, bright, and unmistakably local. This is Browns game day meets nightlife elegance.

menu.title: Beer Cheese Dip with Pretzels
menu.description: Creamy cheese dip made with Great Lakes beer, served with soft pretzel bites. This is Cleveland brewing culture in dip form—rich, boozy, and built for sharing.

menu.title: Jerk-Spiced Doubles
menu.description: Fusion done fearlessly: Trinidad's doubles get a Jamaican jerk spice upgrade. This is two island cultures colliding in the best possible way—curry chickpeas meet scotch bonnet heat.

menu.title: Ackee & Saltfish Bites on Fried Bake
menu.description: Jamaica's national dish reimagined as finger food: scrambled ackee and salted cod on golden fried bake. This is Kingston breakfast energy served after dark.

menu.title: Escovitch Fish in Mini Cups
menu.description: Crispy fried fish topped with tangy pickled vegetables in the Jamaican tradition. Served in mini portions, this dish delivers island-style sweet, sour, and spice in every bite.

menu.title: Curry Goat Sliders with Mango Slaw
menu.description: Tender, slow-cooked Jamaican curry goat on soft buns, topped with sweet mango coleslaw. This is island soul food that demands respect—bold, aromatic, unforgettable.

menu.title: Blackened Catfish with Creole Aioli
menu.description: Southern catfish crusted in Cajun spices and seared to blackened perfection, finished with tangy Creole aioli. This is Louisiana heat meeting soul food elegance.

menu.title: Shrimp & Grits Bites
menu.description: Creamy white cheddar grits topped with sautéed shrimp and smoky Tasso ham. This Lowcountry classic gets the upscale treatment—each bite is Southern luxury.

menu.title: Braised Short Rib on Sweet Potato Medallions
menu.description: Fork-tender short rib over roasted sweet potato rounds, finished with microgreens. This is soul food at its most refined—earthy, elegant, and deeply satisfying.

menu.title: Truffle Mac & Cheese Squares
menu.description: Baked mac and cheese cut into shareable squares, infused with black truffle and topped with golden breadcrumbs. This is the dish that makes vegetarians forget everything else on the menu.

menu.title: Molecular Gastronomy Bites
menu.description: Spheres of flavor that burst on your tongue, edible foams, smoke-filled domes—this is food as theater. Each bite is a science experiment you're excited to taste.

menu.title: Smoke-Infused Canapés
menu.description: Elegant bites presented under glass cloches filled with aromatic smoke. When lifted, wisps of hickory or applewood reveal delicate, flavor-packed creations designed to wow.

menu.title: Caviar on Plantain Chips
menu.description: Luxury meets the Caribbean: briny caviar pearls atop crispy plantain chips with crème fraîche. This is opulence with island soul—unexpected, unforgettable, unapologetic.

menu.title: Street Tacos
menu.description: Authentic carne asada or al pastor on soft corn tortillas with cilantro, onion, and lime. This is taco truck perfection served in a nightclub setting—simple, honest, delicious.

menu.title: Loaded Beef Sliders
menu.description: Juicy beef patties piled high with bacon, cheese, and all the fixings. This is indulgence without apology—messy, satisfying, and designed for late-night cravings.

menu.title: Loaded Nachos
menu.description: Crispy tortilla chips buried under melted cheese, jalapeños, sour cream, guacamole, and your choice of protein. This is shareable chaos you won't want to share.

menu.title: Giant Soft Pretzels with Beer Cheese
menu.description: Warm, pillowy pretzels served with rich beer cheese dip. This is German-American tradition meets craft beer culture—salty, boozy, perfect for soaking up the night.

menu.title: Classic Cheeseburger Sliders
menu.description: Simple perfection: beef, cheese, pickles, ketchup, mustard, on toasted buns. This is American diner culture shrunk down and served with champagne—no frills, all flavor.

menu.title: Mac & Cheese Bites
menu.description: Creamy macaroni and cheese formed into bite-sized portions, breaded, and fried golden. This is comfort food you can dance with—crispy outside, gooey inside.

menu.title: Personal Pizzas
menu.description: Individual pizzas with classic toppings, perfect for late-night munchies. This is the food that keeps the dance floor fueled when the weekend refuses to end.

menu.title: Crab & Callaloo
menu.description: Trinidad's national treasure: blue crab simmered with callaloo greens in coconut milk and island spices. This is the dish that tastes like heritage, pride, and home.

menu.title: Shark & Bake Bites
menu.description: Crispy fried shark nestled in fluffy fried bake bread—Maracas Bay's most famous export. This is Trinidad beach culture served fresh, hot, and worth every calorie.

menu.title: Coconut Bake with Butter
menu.description: Warm, fluffy coconut-infused bake bread served with melting butter. Simple, traditional, soul-warming—this is Trinidad's breakfast staple turned nightlife comfort food.

menu.title: Stewed Chicken with Rice
menu.description: Tender chicken slow-cooked in aromatic Trini-style brown stew, served over fluffy rice. This is Sunday dinner in Port of Spain—familiar, comforting, full of love.

menu.title: Traditional Trini Desserts
menu.description: Sweet endings from the islands: coconut sugar cake, cassava pone, or gulab jamun depending on the night. Each bite is a tribute to Trinidad's diverse cultural tapestry.

menu.title: The Mas
menu.description: Spiced rum meets passionfruit, fresh lime, and aromatic bitters, crowned with nutmeg foam. This cocktail tastes like Trinidad Carnival—wild, vibrant, impossible to forget.

menu.title: Port of Spain Sunset
menu.description: Coconut rum blended with mango nectar, ginger, and finished with citrus smoke under glass. Watch the Caribbean sun set in your glass with every sip.

menu.title: Cleveland Soul
menu.description: Cognac, honey, lemon, and bitters come together in this smooth, sophisticated sipper. This is Cleveland's Black excellence in cocktail form—classy, warm, timeless.

menu.title: Neo Classic
menu.description: Bourbon meets peach purée and vanilla smoke in this R&B-inspired creation. Smooth as Anita Baker, bold as Mary J. Blige—this drink has soul.

menu.title: The Riddim
menu.description: Three types of Caribbean rum collide with tropical juices in organized chaos. This soca-inspired punch tastes like a beach party and hits like a bass drop.

menu.title: Kingston Sour
menu.description: Dark Jamaican rum, fresh lime, egg white, and Angostura bitters create a silky foam-topped masterpiece. This is Kingston sophistication in a coupe glass.

menu.title: Golden Era
menu.description: Hennessy and ginger ale—simple, nostalgic, iconic. This is the drink that fueled '90s house parties, served now with respect and zero pretense.

menu.title: Wu-Tang
menu.description: Spiced rum, honey, lemon, and 36 chambers of flavor. This cocktail brings the ruckus with every sip—complex, bold, unforgettable.

menu.title: The Fete
menu.description: Overproof rum, fresh lime, Angostura bitters, and pure chaos in a glass. This is Trinidad's all-inclusive party spirit distilled into one dangerous, delicious drink.

menu.title: Trini Mule
menu.description: Aged rum replaces vodka in this Caribbean twist on the Moscow Mule. Ginger beer, lime, and island kick make this refreshing, dangerous, and session-able.

menu.title: Fuego
menu.description: Tequila infused with jalapeño heat, balanced with lime and agave sweetness. This drink brings the fire—literally—and doesn't apologize for the burn.

menu.title: Noche Latina
menu.description: White rum, passionfruit, lime, and fresh mint create a refreshing Latin-inspired escape. This cocktail tastes like a warm night in San Juan.

menu.title: The 216
menu.description: Local bourbon, maple syrup, and orange bitters—Cleveland pride in a rocks glass. This is home, warmth, and Rust Belt resilience you can sip slowly.

menu.title: Believeland
menu.description: Vodka, fresh orange juice, pride, and resilience. This simple screwdriver variation tastes like championship parades and comeback stories.

menu.title: Two Islands
menu.description: Jamaican and Trinidadian rums blended in peaceful coexistence with tropical juices. This is the peace treaty between Kingston and Port of Spain, served ice-cold.

menu.title: Crossover
menu.description: A jerk-spiced margarita that shouldn't work but absolutely does. Tequila meets scotch bonnet heat in this fearless Caribbean-Mexican fusion.

menu.title: Black Gold
menu.description: Premium cognac, honey, lemon, and edible gold flakes float in luxury. This cocktail is opulence distilled—smooth, rich, and designed to be seen.

menu.title: Velvet Night
menu.description: Bourbon, dark chocolate liqueur, and scotch bonnet tincture create complex, sultry heat. This is a nightcap with an edge—smooth velvet hiding a dangerous bite.

menu.title: Electric Emerald
menu.description: Gin, glow tonic, chlorophyll, lime, and edible glitter create a neon-green spectacle under UV lights. This cocktail looks like the future and tastes like now.

menu.title: Rose Gold Rush
menu.description: White rum, rose water, gold shimmer, and citrus create an Instagram-worthy cocktail that actually tastes incredible. This is beauty you can drink.

menu.title: The Warehouse
menu.description: Whiskey, ginger beer, lime, and raw Cleveland energy. This industrial-strength cocktail tastes like warehouse parties and underground raves.

menu.title: Rust Belt
menu.description: Bourbon, Angostura bitters, orange peel, and Cleveland grit. This is an old fashioned with a backbone—strong, honest, built to last.

menu.title: Sunday Funday
menu.description: Vodka, pineapple, orange, coconut, and denial that the weekend is ending. This tropical escape tastes like one more night out when you should be resting.

menu.title: Wind Down
menu.description: Whiskey, ginger, honey, and the creeping dread of Monday morning. This cocktail helps you ease into the week ahead—smooth, soothing, inevitable.

menu.title: Independence
menu.description: Aged Angostura rum, bitters, lime, and freedom. This cocktail celebrates Trinidad & Tobago's independence with every sip—proud, strong, undiluted.

menu.title: Red White Black
menu.description: A layered shot representing Trinidad's flag colors—grenadine, cream, and coffee liqueur. This is national pride you can shoot back, patriotism in liquid form.

menu.title: Champagne Service
menu.description: Premium champagne and sparkling wine served on roaming trays throughout the night. This is elegance in motion—bubbles, celebration, and effortless sophistication delivered to your dance floor position.

menu.title: Rum Punch Shots
menu.description: Caribbean rum punch served in shot form—sweet, strong, and dangerously easy to keep ordering. Roaming servers ensure your glass never stays empty long.

menu.title: Sorrel Mimosas
menu.description: Trinidad's hibiscus sorrel mixed with champagne for a Caribbean twist on brunch's favorite cocktail. Tart, bubbly, and served any time of night we feel like it.

menu.title: Cognac Neat Service
menu.description: Premium cognac poured neat and delivered directly to you. No bar wait, no compromise—just smooth, sophisticated sipping while you hold court on the dance floor.

menu.title: Whiskey Cocktail Trays
menu.description: Pre-mixed whiskey cocktails circulating the room on elegant trays. Grab one mid-conversation or mid-dance—convenience meets craft cocktails.

menu.title: Premium Rum Flight Trays
menu.description: Curated rum tastings delivered tableside—Barbadian, Jamaican, Trinidadian pours showcasing the Caribbean's finest. This is education with a buzz.

menu.title: Aged Rum Neat Pours
menu.description: Sipping rums aged to perfection, served neat on roaming trays. This is for the connoisseur who wants quality without the bar line.

menu.title: Hennessy Shot Service
menu.description: Hennessy cognac served in shots and delivered directly to your crew. This is '90s hip-hop culture meets bottle service convenience.

menu.title: Craft Beer Buckets
menu.description: Ice-cold craft beers from local breweries served in portable buckets. Grab a bottle mid-dance and keep the energy high without losing your spot.

menu.title: Carib Beer Bottle Service
menu.description: Trinidad's iconic Carib beer served ice-cold on roaming trays. This is island authenticity you can drink straight from the bottle.

menu.title: Tequila Shot Trays
menu.description: Premium tequila shots with lime and salt, delivered right to you. No bar trip necessary—just grab, shoot, and get back to dancing.

menu.title: Mojitos on Trays
menu.description: Fresh-muddled mojitos circulating the room. Mint, rum, lime, sugar, and bubbles in constant motion—refreshing, classic, always within reach.

menu.title: Red Stripe Beer Service
menu.description: Jamaica's legendary Red Stripe lager served ice-cold and roaming. This is Kingston in a bottle, delivered wherever you're vibing.

menu.title: Caribbean Rum Flight Trays
menu.description: Multi-island rum tastings roaming the venue—compare Jamaican overproof to aged Barbadian to Trini white rum. This is rum education without sitting still.

menu.title: Premium Cognac Neat Pours
menu.description: Hennessy XO, Rémy Martin, and other top-shelf cognacs served neat on elegant trays. This is luxury delivery service for the discerning drinker.

menu.title: Glow-in-the-Dark Cocktails
menu.description: Cocktails infused with glow tonic that illuminate under UV lights. These drinks are as much visual art as they are delicious—futuristic, photogenic, unforgettable.

menu.title: Dry Ice Champagne Presentations
menu.description: Champagne served with theatrical dry ice fog cascading over the glasses. This is celebration as performance art—dramatic, shareable, pure Instagram gold.

menu.title: Emerald-Lit Cocktail Trays
menu.description: Signature cocktails served on LED-lit trays glowing Teasers' emerald green. Every drink delivery is a mini light show—brand immersion you can sip.

menu.title: Great Lakes Beer Trays
menu.description: Cleveland's finest craft beers from Great Lakes Brewing Co. roaming the venue. This is local pride you can drink while repping the 216.

menu.title: Local Spirits Service
menu.description: Cleveland Whiskey and other local distillery products served on roaming trays. Support Cleveland's spirits scene without leaving the dance floor.

menu.title: Well Drink Circulation
menu.description: Classic well cocktails—rum and coke, vodka soda, whiskey ginger—circulating continuously. This is no-frills refreshment that keeps the party moving.

menu.title: Champagne Towers
menu.description: Stacked champagne glasses creating dramatic cascading pours. This is opulence as architecture—visual spectacle meeting celebratory sipping.

menu.title: Endless Rum Punch Circulation
menu.description: All-inclusive rum punch service that never stops. Servers continuously circulate with fresh pours—your glass stays full, your vibes stay high.

menu.title: Nighttime Mimosa Variations
menu.description: Mimosas after dark? Yes, really. Champagne mixed with tropical juices and delivered on roaming trays. Don't judge—just drink and keep dancing.

menu.title: Beer Buckets
menu.description: Ice-filled buckets of domestic and craft beers circulating the venue. Grab a cold one without interrupting your conversation or breaking your dance floor streak.

menu.title: Trini Rum Blends
menu.description: Custom blends of Trinidad's finest rums served on roaming trays. This is island heritage in liquid form, delivered directly to you.

menu.title: Specialty Punches
menu.description: Rotating specialty rum punches unique to each event. From sorrel to passion fruit to tamarind—new flavors every night, constant circulation.

menu.title: Craft Cocktail Trays
menu.description: Bartender-crafted signature cocktails roaming the venue in pre-mixed perfection. This is mixology without the wait—quality drinks delivered to you.

menu.title: Glow Tonic Cocktails in LED Cups
menu.description: Cocktails served in light-up LED cups with glow tonic ingredients. These drinks literally light up the night—drink them before they stop glowing.

takeover.name: Teasers Takeover
takeover.tagline: Transform your venue into a one-night Emerald Noir experience.
takeover.summary: We bring DJs, performers, signature lighting, roaming cocktails, and our guestlist energy. You provide the space—we build the night Cleveland talks about.

process.title: Concept Call
process.details: Align on theme, capacity, production budget, and revenue model. Choose between Carnival After Dark, Neon Noir, Rum & Riddim, or a custom concept.

process.title: Takeover Kit
process.details: Receive moodboards, run-of-show, staffing needs, custom menu, and marketing assets so your team is in sync.

process.title: Marketing Push
process.details: Teasers handles RSVPs and promo drops; venue co-promotes. Optional sponsor integration and influencer suite.

process.title: Show Day
process.details: We stage lighting and sensory elements, brief staff, and run the show—from the first cocktail to the last encore moment.

process.title: Post-Event Debrief
process.details: Receive photo selects, performance metrics, and next steps for residencies or recurring nights.

packages.title: Essentials
packages.description: DJ, host/MC, lighting wash, Teasers-branded marketing + RSVP funnel.
packages.idealFor: Weekday or late-night buyouts wanting a quick energy lift.

packages.title: Signature
packages.description: Essentials plus roaming cocktail carts, curated passed bites, performers or percussionists, and ambient decor.
packages.idealFor: Prime-night takeovers aiming for a full vibe flip.

packages.title: Flagship
packages.description: Signature plus custom set builds, sponsor integrations, influencer content suite, and post-event aftermovie.
packages.idealFor: Large venues or brands seeking a statement collaboration.

whyBarsLoveIt: New audience: Our guestlist arrives early, spends heavy, and shares content.
Content machine: Walk away with cinematic photo/video assets for your own channels.
Repeatable format: Rotate themes monthly for a recurring residency.
Sponsor-ready: Easily integrate rum houses, fashion partners, or local brands.

collective.name: Teasers Creative Collective
collective.tagline: Join the roster powering Cleveland's Emerald Noir nightlife.
collective.intro: Teasers CLE is building an army of performers, DJs, chefs, hosts, servers, designers, and nightlife creatives. Get on the list so we can book you for upcoming pop-ups, takeovers, and the future lounge.
collective.ctaCopy: Drop your details, portfolio, and availability. When we script the next experience, you'll be the first call.

categories.title: Performers & Dancers
categories.description: Soca, dancehall, afrobeats, contemporary, burlesque, aerialists, LED/prop artists, steelpan, percussionists.

categories.title: DJs & Musicians
categories.description: Selectors fluent in soca, afrobeats, amapiano, dancehall, house, R&B blends; live instrumentalists to complement the set (pan, sax, violin, drums).

categories.title: Culinary & Beverage
categories.description: Chefs, pastry artists, mixologists, bar leads who can riff on Caribbean flavors and roaming service concepts.

categories.title: Experience Crew
categories.description: Hosts, servers, model staff, glam squads, costume stylists, set designers, lighting techs, photographers, videographers.

perks: Priority casting for pop-ups, Teasers Takeovers, and the future lounge.
Professional photo/video assets from shows you work.
Collaborative rehearsals, choreography labs, and menu R&D sessions.
Paid opportunities with transparent rates and sponsor perks.

faq.question: Do I need formal training?
faq.answer: No gatekeeping—if you bring stage presence, vibe, and professionalism, we want you. Submit a reel, portfolio, or reference so we feel your energy.

faq.question: Is this paid?
faq.answer: Yes. We align on rates ahead of each booking and spotlight partners, tips, or sponsor bonuses when they're in play.

faq.question: How often do you book talent?
faq.answer: We run multiple events a month—pop-ups, venue takeovers, private collaborations—and keep a rotating roster so gigs stay fresh.
